changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_member') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_member GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_member @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM Guild_Members where character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_member') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_member GO
